description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Thwart off evil weeds as they dry to suck the last bit of water from your planet, paint by numbers to reveal hidden treasures and use logic and a careful eye to create new and undiscovered species of flowers.
description.short: Thwart off evil weeds as they dry to suck the last bit of water from your planet, paint by numbers to reveal hidden treasures and use logic and a careful eye to create new and undiscovered species of flowers.
